com.rivescript

Class Topic

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rivescript.Topic

  • public class Topic
extends java.lang.Object
    A topic manager class for RiveScript.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Topic

        public Topic(java.lang.String name)
        Create a topic manager. Only one per RiveScript interpreter needed.

    • Method Detail

      • setDebug

        public static boolean setDebug(boolean debug)
        Turn on or off debug mode statically. This debug mode is static so it will be shared among all RiveScript instances and all Topics.
        Parameters:
        debug - The new debug mode to set.

      • trigger

        public Trigger trigger(java.lang.String pattern)
        Fetch a Trigger object from the topic. If the trigger doesn't exist, it is created on the fly.
        Parameters:
        pattern - The pattern for the trigger.

      • triggerExists

        public boolean triggerExists(java.lang.String trigger)
        Test if a trigger exists.
        Parameters:
        trigger - The pattern for the trigger.

      • listTriggers

        public java.lang.String[] listTriggers()
        Fetch a sorted list of all triggers. Note that the results are only accurate if you called sortTriggers() for this topic after loading new replies into it (the sortReplies() in RiveScript automagically calls sortTriggers() for all topics, so just make sure you call sortReplies() after loading new replies).

      • listTriggers

        public java.lang.String[] listTriggers(boolean raw)
        Fetch a list of all triggers. If you provide a true value to this method, it will return the UNSORTED list (getting the keys of the trigger hash directly). If you want a SORTED list (which you probably do), use listTriggers() instead, or explicitly provide a false value to this method.
        Parameters:
        raw - Get a raw unsorted list instead of a sorted one.

      • sortTriggers

        public void sortTriggers(java.lang.String[] alltrigs)
        (Re)create the internal sort cache for this topic's triggers.

      • addPrevious

        public void addPrevious(java.lang.String pattern,
               java.lang.String previous)
        Add a mapping between a trigger and a %Previous that follows it.
        Parameters:
        pattern - The trigger pattern.
        previous - The pattern in the %Previous.

      • hasPrevious

        public boolean hasPrevious()
        Check if any trigger in the topic has a %Previous (only good after sortPrevious, from RiveScript.sortReplies is called).

      • listPrevious

        public java.lang.String[] listPrevious()
        Get a list of all the %Previous keys.

      • listPreviousTriggers

        public java.lang.String[] listPreviousTriggers(java.lang.String previous)
        List the triggers associated with a %Previous.
        Parameters:
        previous - The %Previous pattern.

      • sortPrevious

        public void sortPrevious()
        Sort the %Previous buffer.

      • previousExists

        public boolean previousExists(java.lang.String previous)
        Query whether a %Previous is registered with this topic.
        Parameters:
        previous - The pattern in the %Previous.

      • listPrevious

        public java.lang.String[] listPrevious(java.lang.String previous)
        Retrieve a string array of the +Triggers that are associated with a %Previous.
        Parameters:
        previous - The pattern in the %Previous.

      • includes

        public void includes(java.lang.String topic)
        Add a topic that this one includes.
        Parameters:
        topic - The included topic's name.

      • inherits

        public void inherits(java.lang.String topic)
        Add a topic that this one inherits.
        Parameters:
        topic - The inherited topic's name.

      • includes

        public java.lang.String[] includes()
        Retrieve a list of included topics.

      • inherits

        public java.lang.String[] inherits()
        Retrieve a list of inherited topics.
